thread.title: Dazzling Eid Festivities at Four Seasons Hotel Cairo at Nile Plaza
thread.title_full: Dazzling Eid Festivities at Four Seasons Hotel Cairo at Nile Plaza

author: Pappu
title: Dazzling Eid Festivities at Four Seasons Hotel Cairo at Nile Plaza
text:
HOTEL NEWS » Dazzling Eid Festivities at Four Seasons Hotel Cairo at Nile Plaza Dazzling Eid Festivities at Four Seasons Hotel Cairo at Nile Plaza   
Four Seasons Hotel Cairo at Nile Plaza is set to mark Eid Al-Fitr festivities with exceptional packages and the most indulgent food. Celebrate among friends and family, escape the hasty pace of the city and experience the gracious elegance of Four Seasons with incredible room offers from July 17 to 26, 2015. 

In celebration of Eid, the Hotel’s extraordinary culinary team has created sumptuous dining choices that guarantee a truly festive setting for families and friends. Everyone can feast their eyes on the Eid brunch at Zitouni, where guests can savour mouth-watering Egyptian flavours made with the freshest local ingredients while enjoying panoramic views of the Nile. 

It isn’t Eid without endless supply of chocolate, and enthusiasts will be amused by the delectable Chocolate Nights at the Lobby Lounge. Beymen Café will also be offering a variety of specialty Eid biscuits for the sweet tooth. 

What is a holiday without entertainment? Graffiti Bar & Lounge will add some spice to Eid celebrations with fun-filled nights of DJ beats, live entertainment, Lebanese singer Myriam Klink and the special exhilarating performance of belly dancer Oxana throughout Eid days. Related Posts
